mapper.select: SELECT MAX(RESERVATION_NO) FROM RESERVATION WHERE USER_NO=#{userNo}
SELECT RESERVE_DATE, RESERVE_COUNT, RESERVE_TIME, USER_NICK || '님 ' || RESERVE_TIME || '시 ' || RESERVE_COUNT || '명 ' AS USER_NICK FROM RESERVATION JOIN "USER" USING(USER_NO) WHERE SHOP_NO = #{shopNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE RESERVATION SET R_STATE = #{rState} WHERE RESERVATION_NO = #{reservationNo}
UPDATE SHOP SET SHOP_POINT = NVL(SHOP_POINT,0) + (SELECT NVL(PAYMENT_POINT,0) FROM RESERVATION WHERE RESERVATION_NO = #{reservationNo}) WHERE SHOP_NO = #{shopNo}
UPDATE "USER" SET USER_POINT = USER_POINT+(SELECT PAYMENT_POINT FROM RESERVATION WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo} AND RESERVATION_NO=#{reservationNo}) WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo}
mapper.select: SELECT SHOP_NAME, RESERVE_DATE, SHOP_NO, RESERVATION_NO, RESERVATION.USER_NO, R_STATE FROM RESERVATION JOIN SHOP USING (SHOP_NO) WHERE RESERVATION.USER_NO = #{userNo} ORDER BY RESERVE_DATE DESC

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY RESERVE_DATE DESC) AS NUM, SHOP_NAME, SHOP_NO, RESERVE_DATE, RESERVATION_NO, RESERVATION.USER_NO, R_STATE FROM RESERVATION JOIN SHOP USING (SHOP_NO) WHERE RESERVATION.USER_NO = #{userNo}) WHERE NUM BETWEEN 1 AND 3
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERVATION WHERE USER_NO = #{userNo}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERVATION WHERE SHOP_NO = #{shopNo}

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY RESERVE_DATE DESC) AS NUM, SHOP_NAME, R_STATE, SHOP_NO, RESERVE_DATE, RESERVE_TIME, RESERVE_COUNT, RESERVATION_NO, RESERVATION.USER_NO FROM RESERVATION JOIN SHOP USING (SHOP_NO) WHERE RESERVATION.USER_NO = #{userNo}) WHERE NUM BETWEEN 1 AND 3
SELECT USER_NICK, RESERVE_COUNT, RESERVE_DATE, R_STATE, RESERVATION_NO FROM RESERVATION JOIN "USER" USING(USER_NO) WHERE SHOP_NO = #{shopNo} ORDER BY RESERVE_DATE DESC
